name: Overly Powerfull
description:
Awoke to a realm unknown, a journey begin  where you mindlessly defeat enemies and then win. 

Defeat enemies with punches and kicks along with range attacks.

Level up and defeat bosses to learn new skills and attacks.

Minimum spec tested with:

AMD Athlon 5350 

Radeon RX 550

8GB RAM

Game is also available at:

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/overly-powerfull/9nhg8c5rx6fm
